price: بېشکه هغو کسانو چې جرم يې کړی پر هغو کسانو پورې خندل چې ايمان يې راوړی وو.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجۡرَمُواْ كَانُواْ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ يَضۡحَكُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna ajramū kānū mina alladhīna āmanū yaḍḥakūna
